entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kincardine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 1.
